title: Marc：PC Realms比PE更先进
author: zx728925
txt_content:
Marc：PC Realms has existed for four years, PE Realms for less than one. That's why it's more advanced.
Marc：PC Realms已经存在了4年了，而PE Realms只存在了不到1年。这就是PC Realms更先进的原因。
